Design across multiple corners
==============================

In this section we are going to demonstrate how you can set up a 
design task that will search for the design parameters for which the 
circuit satisfies the design requirements across all defined corners. 
All of the project files can be found in `demo/gui/miller/ <../../../demo/gui/miller/>`_

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   
   gui.task-cbd.setup.rst
   gui.task-cbd.running.rst
